chunk:
Eve Milan New York Gentle Face Cleaning Gel No. 103 (2020 formulation)

Brand: Eve Milan New York

Category: Facial Cleanser
book: 1219-Eve Milan New York Gentle Face Cleaning Gel No

chunk: Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, EcoCert Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Vegetable Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera Extract (Coconut Milk), Cucumis Sativa (Cucumber) Peel Extract, Oat Flour, Chamaemelum nobile (Chamomile) Leaf Extract, Zinc PCA, Panthenol (ProVitamin B5), Glucosamine, Allantoin, Xanthamonas campestris
book: 1219-Eve Milan New York Gentle Face Cleaning Gel No

chunk: (Coconut Milk), Cucumis Sativa (Cucumber) Peel Extract, Oat Flour, Chamaemelum nobile (Chamomile) Leaf Extract, Zinc PCA, Panthenol (ProVitamin B5), Glucosamine, Allantoin, Xanthamonas campestris (Xanthan) Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Cucumber Seed
book: 1219-Eve Milan New York Gentle Face Cleaning Gel No

chunk:
Directions: 1. Apply to damp skin, avoiding eyes and lips, using circular motion.
2. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
3. For best results use in the morning and at night followed by our Hydrating or Refreshing Toner.
book: 1219-Eve Milan New York Gentle Face Cleaning Gel No

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
